Question
========
  
Which of the following terms does **not** represent the deviation of the observed *y* score from the predicted *y* score $(y-\hat{y})$
  
Answerlist
----------
* Prediction error
* Error rate
* Error
* Residue

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
